title: The 'zilla has awakened! (Now what?)
summary: Holy shit, it's done: Mozilla 1.0 Release Notes. No asymptotic versions (ie. 0.9, 0.99, 0.9998, 0.99999314), the fork has been stuck and the fat lady will dance, along with the skinny ones and others of all sizes.
content:
Holy shit, it's done: Mozilla 1.0 Release Notes. No asymptotic versions (ie. 0.9, 0.99, 0.9998, 0.99999314), the fork has been stuck and the fat lady will dance, along with the skinny ones and others of all sizes.

shortname=oooaha
